title: The Styx Complex
description: The secrets of the world's largest cosmetics and fashion empire are jealously guarded by its dynamic head, the international beauty, Madame Ava Bardoff. Behind the glamorous facade of her fantastic chateau high above St. Tropez begin to unfold demonic forces that threaten the security of governments and their international relations. Only one man suspects their connection to the series of seemingly unrelated deaths and mysterious happenings that are befalling key statesmen of major powers, particularly the oil-producing nations.As Hugo Montclair sits on his millionaire's yacht off the French Riviera surrounded by the glitter and frivolity of jet set society, his alarm becomes focused upon the operations of the House of Bardoff. Suddenly finding himself drawn into a terrifying and deadly race against time, Montclair must desperately recruit a strange group of allies, including the young lovers whose welfare means most to him, to combat the thread of the Styx Complex before it overwhelms the world.
author: Russell Rhodes
